original_text:
Monopoly Money Grab
 
Un gioco storico in una veste nuova
Di Monopoli ce n’è uno solo, direbbe qualcuno! Siamo spiacenti di dover smentire questa affermazione, di Monopoli ci sono tante versioni differenti, una di questa è quella Money Grab rilasciata da Hasbro nel 2018. La Light & Wonder ha deciso di farla sua creando una versione online, con una slot molto divertente e dinamica.
Il gioco è naturalmente incentrato su Rich Uncle Pennybags, il ricco personaggio oggi chiamato semplicemente Mr. Monopoli, che possiamo vedere alla sinistra della griglia. Nel gioco ha un ruolo attivo nella funzione Hit & Spin, ma vedremo meglio questo aspetto nei prossimi paragrafi.
Monopoly Money Grab è ambientato in una stanza piena di banconote, lingotti e monete d’oro. Tutti i simboli sono disegnati con maestria e, a rendere più vive le giocate, ci sono alcune animazioni interessanti.
Il comparto sonoro è una musica incalzante con alcuni assoli di tromba su una base elettronica.
 
Caratteristiche principali di  Monopoly Money Grab
Prima di iniziare a giocare dobbiamo innanzitutto decidere quanto puntare. Le scommesse sono alla portata di tutti, si parte da un minimo di 0,20 € per tutte le 25 linee di pagamento disposte su una griglia a 5 rulli e 3 righe.
Si vince associando almeno tre simboli identici su rulli adiacenti, sempre da sinistra verso destra. Ci sono due funzioni che accelerano la caduta dei simboli: la prima è il Quick Spin, la rotazione veloce dei rulli, la seconda è l’Autoplay, con cui si possono impostare da 5 a 100 giri automatici.
La vincita massima è di 5.000 volte la puntata, raggiungibile anche grazie alla volatilità alta e a un RTP del 96%.
 
Come si gioca a Monopoly Money Grab
In totale troviamo 9 simboli, 5 di basso livello, 4 con un valore alto. Al primo gruppo appartengono le carte da gioco dal dieci all’Asso, nel secondo gruppo troviamo invece il cilindro, la casta, il cane e Mr. Monopoli in persona.
Vediamo ora i simboli speciali, a cominciare dal Wild, che sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto gli Scatter, che sono invece tre:

Bonus Wheel: appare soltanto nel gioco base sui rulli 1, 3 e 5. Ne servono tre per dare avvio alla feature. Si parte con una ruota divisa in settori, ognuno dei quali ospita un premio. A disposizione ci sono la funzione Hit & Spin Free Spins, Money Grab Bonus game o uno dei tre Jackpot.
The Money Grab Feature: quando atterrano 3 Wild, in modo casuale dal sacco accanto alla griglia possono essere lanciati moltiplicatori cores tra 3x e 50x.
Hit & Win: il simbolo della cassaforte e quello del mazzetto di banconote dà avvio a questa funzione. Mr. Monopoli salta sul primo rullo e vengono aggiunti diversi moltiplicatori compresi tra 1x e 5x. Se il simbolo cassaforte appare durante i Free Spins, vengono aggiunte 3 righe, portando il totale a 6 e elargiti diversi moltiplicatori.


Domande Frequenti 
Qual è la vincita massima di Monopoly Money Grab?

In questo gioco si può ottenere una somma pari a 5.000 volte la puntata.



Quanti Scatter ci sono?

In questo gioco ci sono tre simboli Scatter.



Dove posso giocare a Monopoly Money Grab?

Questo gioco è disponibile su tutto i casinò legali dotati di certificazione governativa.

raw_translation.response:
Monopoly Money Grab

A classic game in a new guise.

There may be only one monopoly, some would say! We're sorry to refute this assertion, but there are many different versions of Monopoly to choose from, and one of them is Money Grab, released by Hasbro in 2018. Light & Wonder has made it their own by creating an online version with an exciting and dynamic slot machine.

Rich Uncle Pennybags, the affluent character now simply known as Mr. Monopoly, is the game's focus and appears to the left of the grid. He plays an active role in the Hit & Spin feature, but we'll delve into that in more detail in the following paragraphs.

Monopoly Money Grab is set in a room full of banknotes, bullion, and gold coins. All the symbols are expertly designed, and there are some interesting animations to liven up the gameplay.

The soundtrack features racy music with trumpet solos over an electronic base.

Key Features of Monopoly Money Grab

Before beginning to play, we must first decide how much to wager. Bets are accessible to everyone, starting from a minimum of €0.20 for all 25 paylines arranged on a grid of 5 reels and 3 rows.

To win, we must match at least three identical symbols on adjacent reels, always from left to right. There are two features that speed up the fall of the symbols: Quick Spin is the first, which rotates the reels quickly, while Autoplay is the second, allowing for between 5 and 100 automatic spins to be set.

The maximum payout is 5,000 times the wager, which can be achieved thanks to the high volatility and an RTP of 96%.

How to Play Monopoly Money Grab

There are a total of 9 symbols, 5 of low value and 4 with high value. Card symbols from ten to ace belong to the first group, while the second group features the cylinder, the boot, the dog, and Mr. Monopoly himself.

Let's now examine the special symbols, starting with the Wild, which substitutes for all symbols except the Scatters, of which there are three:

Bonus Wheel: This appears only on the base game reels 1, 3, and 5. Three are needed for the feature to begin. The first step is spinning a wheel with segments, each of which contains a prize. Available options include the Hit & Spin Free Spins function, Money Grab Bonus game, or one of three Jackpots.

The Money Grab Feature: When three Wilds land, core multipliers ranging from 3x to 50x can be randomly launched from the bag next to the grid.

Hit & Win: The safe symbol and the bundle of notes symbol initiate this feature. Mr. Monopoly jumps onto the first reel and several multipliers ranging from 1x to 5x are added. If the safe symbol appears during Free Spins, three rows are added, bringing the total to six, and several multipliers are awarded.

FAQs

What is the maximum payout of Monopoly Money Grab?

In this game, you can win a sum equal to 5,000 times the wager.

How many Scatters are there?

There are three Scatter symbols in this game.

Where can I play Monopoly Money Grab?

This game is available on all legal casinos certified by the government.

Review: Monopoly Money Grab

A classic game in a new guise.

There may be only one monopoly, some would say! We're sorry to refute this assertion, but there are many different versions of Monopoly to choose from, and one of them is Money Grab, released by Hasbro in 2018. Light & Wonder has made it their own by creating an online version with an exciting and dynamic slot machine.

Rich Uncle Pennybags, the affluent character now simply known as Mr. Monopoly, is the game's focus and appears to the left of the grid. He plays an active role in the Hit & Spin feature, but we'll delve into that in more detail in the following paragraphs.

Monopoly Money Grab is set in a room full of banknotes, bullion, and gold coins. All the symbols are expertly designed, and there are some interesting animations to liven up the gameplay.

The soundtrack features racy music with trumpet solos over an electronic base.

Key Features of Monopoly Money Grab

Before beginning to play, we must first decide how much to wager. Bets are accessible to everyone, starting from a minimum of €0.20 for all 25 paylines arranged on a grid of 5 reels and 3 rows.

To win, we must match at least three identical symbols on adjacent reels, always from left to right. There are two features that speed up the fall of the symbols: Quick Spin is the first, which rotates the reels quickly, while Autoplay is the second, allowing for between 5 and 100 automatic spins to be set.

The maximum payout is 5,000 times the wager, which can be achieved thanks to the high volatility and an RTP of 96%.

How to Play Monopoly Money Grab

There are a total of 9 symbols, 5 of low value and 4 with high value. Card symbols from ten to ace belong to the first group, while the second group features the cylinder, the boot, the dog, and Mr. Monopoly himself.

Let's now examine the special symbols, starting with the Wild, which substitutes for all symbols except the Scatters, of which there are three:

Bonus Wheel: This appears only on the base game reels 1, 3, and 5. Three are needed for the feature to begin. The first step is spinning a wheel with segments, each of which contains a prize. Available options include the Hit & Spin Free Spins function, Money Grab Bonus game, or one of three Jackpots.

The Money Grab Feature: When three Wilds land, core multipliers ranging from 3x to 50x can be randomly launched from the bag next to the grid.

Hit & Win: The safe symbol and the bundle of notes symbol initiate this feature. Mr. Monopoly jumps onto the first reel and several multipliers ranging from 1x to 5x are added. If the safe symbol appears during Free Spins, three rows are added, bringing the total to six, and several multipliers are awarded.

In this game, you can win a sum equal to 5,000 times the wager.
